data.lyric:
[ti:Counting Sheep]
[ar:SAFIA]
[al:Counting Sheep]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Counting Sheep - SAFIA
[00:03.44]Lyrics by：Benjamin Woolner-Kirkham/Harrison Sayers/Michael Bell
[00:06.88]Composed by：Benjamin Woolner-Kirkham/Harrison Sayers/Michael Bell
[00:10.32]I never make a sound
[00:12.82]Fingers crossed I shut my mouth
[00:15.94]Thoughts they're creeping through my teeth
[00:18.99]
[00:20.27]Drip drop the night is loud
[00:22.80]Silence seems to drown me out
[00:25.41]Box my thoughts and give me some relief
[00:30.63]I wanna let you down
[00:32.97]Make you toss and turn around
[00:35.66]
[00:36.18]Won't you give me what I need
[00:39.54]
[00:40.51]I wanna let you down
[00:43.05]And I'm always lost and never found
[00:45.45]
[00:46.43]Won't you give me what I need
[00:50.90]Tick tock make me creep
[00:53.18]Never ending counting sheep
[00:56.23]
[00:56.87]Never get no sleep
[00:58.64]
[01:00.79]Tick tock make me creep
[01:03.28]Never ending counting sheep
[01:06.22]
[01:07.09]Never get no sleep
[01:08.74]
[01:13.84]Do you know what the most frightening thing in the world is it's fear
[01:17.54]
[01:18.25]Did you plan on going to bed in the near future no
[01:21.27]
[01:22.52]There's nothing to worry about you're going to be just fine
[01:26.85]But whatever you do
[01:27.90]
[01:28.76]Don't fall asleep
[01:32.19]
[01:33.61]Don't drop the curtains down
[01:36.15]Darkness is the whole surround
[01:39.04]My mind is lurking at my feet at my feet
[01:43.66]Criss cross the night is sour
[01:46.25]Pupils fixed on every hour
[01:48.89]Sunrise is the only thing that's sweet
[01:53.82]I wanna let you down
[01:56.28]Make you toss and turn around
[01:58.94]
[01:59.49]Won't you give me what I need what I need
[02:03.87]I wanna let you down
[02:06.38]And I'm always lost and never found
[02:09.03]
[02:09.77]Won't you give me what I need
[02:14.30]Tick tock make me creep
[02:16.49]Never ending counting sheep
[02:19.56]
[02:20.21]Never get no sleep
[02:22.07]

[02:26.60]Never ending counting sheep
